title: Handle a VIP Arrival
description: The CEO of a major sponsor is arriving for a game and needs to be escorted to their suite.

tasks.description: Receive notification that the VIP has arrived at the VIP entrance.
Look up the VIP's details, including their suite number and designated hospitality manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the VIP's information in the guest list.

tasks.description: Dispatch the designated hospitality manager to the VIP entrance to greet the guest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent contacts the manager and directs them to the entrance.
